page.title: 11JULIA'S SUNDAY
page.content: Today I got up at 6.00 for a cup of tea and biscuit. I got in the cows ready for milking. I fed the cows and calves, and watched dad milk some of the cows. At 8.00 I put on some bacon, eggs and potato. We ate at 9.00. I hung up some washing and then got ready for Sunday School which begins at 11.00. Back at home I put on my old clothes. After dinner I rode my bike until 3.30 when I fed the hens. The washing was got in, then the cows. At 4.30 I got ready tea - for 5.00. At 6.00 I put the cows into the yard, then played out of doors with my sister. I watched T.V. for half an hour before supper. I bathed and went to bed at 9.00. Then there was time to read. Julia Gillbard
